testcase.classname: US19 Wallet to be used in shopping and its functions
testcase.name: 1905 Cancel button in Recharge Amount tab
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser go to url "userUrl"......................................passed Then User clicks on the login link, enters "boramail" and "password" and logs in..passed Then User clicks on dashboard link..........................................passed Then User clicks My Wallet section on dashboard page........................passed Then User verifies that the Cancel button on the Recharge Amount tab is visible and working, to cancel the operation.passed Then User closes the page...................................................passed
